@@ -1,1 +1,298 @@
-
+{
+  "grade": "PP1",
+  "topics": [
+    {
+      "id": "pp1-t1",
+      "title": "Greetings and Introductions",
+      "description": "Learning basic greetings and introductions",
+      "order_index": 1,
+      "subtopics": [
+        {
+          "id": "pp1-t1-s1",
+          "title": "Hello and Goodbye",
+          "description": "Learning basic greetings and farewells",
+          "order_index": 1,
+          "lessons": [
+            {
+              "id": "pp1-t1-s1-l1",
+              "title": "Hello",
+              "description": "Learning to say hello",
+              "content_type": "speaking_practice",
+              "duration": 30,
+              "difficulty": "beginner",
+              "metadata": {
+                "targetAge": [4, 5],
+                "languageSkills": ["speaking", "listening"]
+              },
+              "questions": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t1-s1-l1-q1",
+                  "type": "speaking",
+                  "title": "Say 'Hello'",
+                  "content": "Learn to say 'hello'",
+                  "exercise_prompts": [
+                    {
+                      "text": "Say 'hello'",
+                      "narration": "Let's learn our first greeting! Can you say 'hello'?",
+                      "saytext": "Hello",
+                      "order_index": 1
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Show a smile and say 'hello'",
+                      "narration": "Smile and say 'hello'. Very good!",
+                      "saytext": "Hello",
+                      "order_index": 2
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Complete the sentence",
+                      "narration": "The sun is... (wait for students to say 'hello')",
+                      "saytext": "Hello",
+                      "order_index": 3
+                    }
+                  ]
+                }
+              ],
+              "activities": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t1-s1-l1-a1",
+                  "title": "Greeting Practice",
+                  "type": "individual_activity",
+                  "description": "Students practice greeting others",
+                  "instructions": "When you see someone, say 'hello' and smile.",
+                  "duration": 5
+                }
+              ]
+            }
+          ]
+        },
+        {
+          "id": "pp1-t1-s2",
+          "title": "Introducing Yourself",
+          "description": "Learning how to introduce yourself",
+          "order_index": 2,
+          "lessons": [
+            {
+              "id": "pp1-t1-s2-l1",
+              "title": "My Name is...",
+              "description": "Learning to introduce yourself",
+              "content_type": "speaking_practice",
+              "duration": 30,
+              "difficulty": "beginner",
+              "metadata": {
+                "targetAge": [4, 5],
+                "languageSkills": ["speaking", "listening"]
+              },
+              "questions": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t1-s2-l1-q1",
+                  "type": "speaking",
+                  "title": "Introduce Yourself",
+                  "content": "Tell us your name",
+                  "exercise_prompts": [
+                    {
+                      "text": "Tell us your name",
+                      "narration": "What's your name?",
+                      "saytext": "My name is...",
+                      "order_index": 1
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Complete the sentence",
+                      "narration": "The person is... (wait for students to say their name)",
+                      "saytext": "My name is...",
+                      "order_index": 2
+                    }
+                  ]
+                }
+              ],
+              "activities": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t1-s2-l1-a1",
+                  "title": "Name Tag",
+                  "type": "individual_activity",
+                  "description": "Students write their name on a tag",
+                  "instructions": "Write your name on a tag and wear it around your neck.",
+                  "duration": 5
+                }
+              ]
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+      ]
+    },
+    {
+      "id": "pp1-t2",
+      "title": "Numbers and Counting",
+      "description": "Learning numbers 1-10 and basic counting",
+      "order_index": 2,
+      "subtopics": [
+        {
+          "id": "pp1-t2-s1",
+          "title": "Numbers 1-5",
+          "description": "Introduction to numbers one through five",
+          "order_index": 1,
+          "lessons": [
+            {
+              "id": "pp1-t2-s1-l1",
+              "title": "Counting to Three",
+              "description": "Learn to count from one to three",
+              "content_type": "speaking_practice",
+              "duration": 30,
+              "difficulty": "beginner",
+              "metadata": {
+                "targetAge": [4, 5],
+                "languageSkills": ["speaking", "listening", "counting"]
+              },
+              "questions": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t2-s1-l1-q1",
+                  "type": "speaking",
+                  "title": "Say Number One",
+                  "content": "Learn to say 'one'",
+                  "exercise_prompts": [
+                    {
+                      "text": "Say the number 'one'",
+                      "narration": "Let's learn our first number! Can you say 'one'?",
+                      "saytext": "One",
+                      "order_index": 1
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Show one finger and say 'one'",
+                      "narration": "Hold up one finger and say 'one'. Very good!",
+                      "saytext": "One",
+                      "order_index": 2
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Point to one object and say 'one'",
+                      "narration": "Point to one thing on your desk and say 'one'",
+                      "saytext": "One",
+                      "order_index": 3
+                    }
+                  ]
+                },
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t2-s1-l1-q2",
+                  "type": "speaking",
+                  "title": "Count to Two",
+                  "content": "Learn to count one, two",
+                  "exercise_prompts": [
+                    {
+                      "text": "Count 'one, two'",
+                      "narration": "Now let's count together: 'one, two'!",
+                      "saytext": "One, two",
+                      "order_index": 1
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Show two fingers and count",
+                      "narration": "Hold up two fingers and count them: 'one, two'",
+                      "saytext": "One, two",
+                      "order_index": 2
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Point and count two objects",
+                      "narration": "Point to two things on your desk and count them",
+                      "saytext": "One, two",
+                      "order_index": 3
+                    }
+                  ]
+                }
+              ],
+              "activities": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t2-s1-l1-a1",
+                  "title": "Desk Counting",
+                  "type": "individual_activity",
+                  "description": "Students count objects on their desk",
+                  "instructions": "Look at your pencils. Count them by pointing to each one. Say the numbers clearly.",
+                  "duration": 5
+                },
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t2-s1-l1-a2",
+                  "title": "Number Fingers",
+                  "type": "class_activity",
+                  "description": "Students show numbers with fingers while seated",
+                  "instructions": "When I say a number, show that many fingers and say the number.",
+                  "duration": 5
+                }
+              ]
+            }
+          ]
+        },
+        {
+          "id": "pp1-t2-s2",
+          "title": "Numbers 6-10",
+          "description": "Learning to count from six to ten",
+          "order_index": 2,
+          "lessons": [
+            // Similar structure for numbers 6-10
+          ]
+        }
+      ]
+    },
+    {
+      "id": "pp1-t3",
+      "title": "Colors and Shapes",
+      "description": "Basic colors and simple shapes",
+      "order_index": 3,
+      "subtopics": [
+        {
+          "id": "pp1-t3-s1",
+          "title": "Primary Colors",
+          "description": "Learning red, blue, and yellow",
+          "order_index": 1,
+          "lessons": [
+            {
+              "id": "pp1-t3-s1-l1",
+              "title": "Red Color",
+              "description": "Learning about the color red",
+              "content_type": "speaking_practice",
+              "duration": 30,
+              "difficulty": "beginner",
+              "metadata": {
+                "targetAge": [4, 5],
+                "languageSkills": ["speaking", "listening", "observation"]
+              },
+              "questions": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t3-s1-l1-q1",
+                  "type": "speaking",
+                  "title": "Say 'Red'",
+                  "content": "Learn to say the color red",
+                  "exercise_prompts": [
+                    {
+                      "text": "Say the color 'red'",
+                      "narration": "Look at this bright color! It's red. Can you say 'red'?",
+                      "saytext": "Red",
+                      "order_index": 1
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Find something red",
+                      "narration": "Can you find something red on your desk or in your books?",
+                      "saytext": "This is red",
+                      "order_index": 2
+                    },
+                    {
+                      "text": "Complete the sentence",
+                      "narration": "The apple is... (wait for students to say 'red')",
+                      "saytext": "Red",
+                      "order_index": 3
+                    }
+                  ]
+                }
+              ],
+              "activities": [
+                {
+                  "id": "pp1-t3-s1-l1-a1",
+                  "title": "Color Spotting",
+                  "type": "individual_activity",
+                  "description": "Students identify red objects in their books",
+                  "instructions": "Open your picture book. Point to all the red things you can find. Say 'This is red' for each one.",
+                  "duration": 5
+                }
+              ]
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+      ]
+    }
+  ]
+}
